name: 王錫九
objective:
對於從事科學及工程學習與研究的人員而言，物理是其入門的重要基礎。藉由對物理知識的深入講解與相關技能的介紹，有助於同學踏入更高等的相關專業知識與技術的學習。
本課程除了以課本教材為基礎來介紹外，在課外時間同學必須在圖書館或相關知識頻道尋找相關資料以培養及訓練課外物理閱讀能力。

Week 1: Introduction and Quiz
Week 2: Vector and one dimensional motions
Week 3: Vector and one dimensional motions

Week 5: Laws of motions
Week 6: Laws of motions

week 8: Applications of Newton's laws
Week 9: Energy and energy transfer
Week 10: Midterm examination
week 11:Energy and energy transfer
Week 12: potential energy
Week 13: Momentum and collisions
Week 14: Rotational motion
Week 15: Rotational motion
Week 16: Oscillatory motion
week 17: Mechanical waves
Week 18: Waves
week 19: Final examination
